pr_title: RDM-6943 - Replace Open Passwords with Environment Vars in all Test Data

timeline.message: RDM-6943 WIP amended json to call environment vars
RDM-6943 added environment variables to jenkins files
RDM-6943 fixed env var for passwords
RDM-6943 fixed env var for passwords

timeline.bodyText:
could we please rename these like
befta.caseworker.1 --> CCD_BEFTA_CASEWORKER_1_PWD
timeline.author: MSancaktutar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,6 +34,17 @@ def secrets = [
         secret('ccd-restricted-cross-case-type-caseworker-email', 'CCD_RESTRICTED_CROSS_CASE_TYPE_CASEWORKER_EMAIL'),
         secret('ccd-restricted-cross-case-type-caseworker-password', 'CCD_RESTRICTED_CROSS_CASE_TYPE_CASEWORKER_PASSWORD'),
         secret('ccd-api-gateway-oauth2-client-secret', 'OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET'),
+
+        //Required for FTA test RDM-6943
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-solicitor-one-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_AUTOTEST_SOLICITOR_ONE_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-solicitor-two-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_AUTOTEST_SOLICITOR_TWO_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-solicitor-three-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_AUTOTEST_SOLICITOR_THREE_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-one-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_ONE_AUTOTEST_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-two-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_TWO_AUTOTEST_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-three-password', 'CCD_CASEWORKER_THREE_AUTOTEST_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-citizen-two-password', 'CCD_CITIZEN_TWO_AUTOTEST_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-citizen-three-password', 'CCD_CITIZEN_THREE_AUTOTEST_PASSWORD'),
+        secret('ccd-solicitor-three-password', 'CCD_AUTOTEST_THREE_SOLICITOR_PASSWORD')

timeline.bodyText:
Since we have renamed the values of the secret to add BEFTA we should rename the key values too to reflect this like the other  secret key values eg:
ccd-caseworker-solicitor-one-password -> ccd-**befta-**caseworker-solicitor-one-password
timeline.author: noronhaa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,6 +34,17 @@ def secrets = [
         secret('ccd-restricted-cross-case-type-caseworker-email', 'CCD_RESTRICTED_CROSS_CASE_TYPE_CASEWORKER_EMAIL'),
         secret('ccd-restricted-cross-case-type-caseworker-password', 'CCD_RESTRICTED_CROSS_CASE_TYPE_CASEWORKER_PASSWORD'),
         secret('ccd-api-gateway-oauth2-client-secret', 'OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET'),
+
+        //Required for FTA test RDM-6943
+        secret('ccd-caseworker-solicitor-one-password', 'CCD_BEFTA_CASEWORKER_2_SOLICITOR_1_PWD'),

replies.bodyText: @RebeccaBaker  - Could we pls rename the secrets to the same name as that of the environment variable, except for a "-" instead of "_"?
replies.author: MSancaktutar

timeline.message: RDM-6943 updated secret names to match the rename of environment variables
RDM-6943 updated secret names to match the rename of environment variables
